code: import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:'/api'});api.interceptors.request.use(cfg=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token)cfg.headers['Authorization']="Bearer ".concat(token);return cfg;});export const authAPI={login:(email,password)=>api.post('/auth/login',{email,password}),register:(username,email,password)=>api.post('/auth/register',{username,email,password}),me:()=>api.get('/auth/me')};export const tasksAPI={list:()=>api.get('/tasks'),create:task=>api.post('/tasks',task),update:(id,task)=>api.put("/tasks/".concat(id),task),remove:id=>api.delete("/tasks/".concat(id)),stats:()=>api.get('/tasks/analytics/stats')};export default api;
